typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		full_path as string,
		last_modified as timestamp,
		last_modified_iso as string,
		last_modified_timestamp as double,
		name as long,
		size as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> AzureBlobStorageSecFilings
AzureBlobStorageSecFilings derive(each(match(name=='name'), $$ = toString($$))) ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='last_modified_iso'&&name!='last_modified_timestamp'&&name!='size'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 derive(cik_number = split(full_path, '/')[7],
		accession_number = split(full_path, '/')[8],
		date_pulled = currentDate(),
		is_pulled = false()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(item_id = concat(cik_number, accession_number)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 derive(item_id = toString(item_id)) ~> ModifyColumns2
ModifyColumns2 select(mapColumn(
		item_id,
		full_path,
		last_modified,
		name,
		type,
		cik_number,
		accession_number,
		date_pulled,
		is_pulled
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> SqlDump
